website_summaries.verdict: This top-of-the-line hemp oil sets the standard for others, from its USDA organic certification to its avoidance of GMOs in its formulation.
pros: Delivers omega 3-6-9 in formulation, and comes in a large, affordable 24-oz
Most notice lower levels of pain with use
cons: Some dislike the taste of the oil, while others can have allergic reactions, sore throats, and stomach aches

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: love this magic potion .... lower BP, less anxiety, eyesight clearer, also helpful with rheumatoid pain.... helped my sister's Chronns disease and kidney stones seem to be breaking up
customer_reviews.author: Judy L

customer_reviews.title: But I have noticed that my skin looks better and my hair seems softer
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure if this is doing all of the things that hemp oil claims to do. But I have noticed that my skin looks better and my hair seems softer. Ive used it 5 days a week for about a month now. I put two tablespoons into my morning smoothie. It has a nutty flavor. Almost like sunflower seeds. So I add a dollop of peanut butter to somewhat hide it. I have read its good in salad dressing which I havent tried but can see how or why it would taste good. I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I suffer from severe skin reactions caused by allergies. Nutiva Hemp Oil is very effective in calming down my reactions. It works better than all of the chemical based products on the market. I've already bought more.
customer_reviews.author: Juan J.

customer_reviews.title: It is a great source of Vit
customer_reviews.text: I have to have this. It is a great source of Vit. E and Omega's- on top of that it taste like melted butter. I put this on almost everything and absolutely love it on sliced Persian cucumber with salt and pepper as an bedtime snack to stabilize my blood sugar
customer_reviews.author: Andria E. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: ... using for a few months and I am very pleased with the extra energy I have
customer_reviews.text: I been using for a few months and I am very pleased with the extra energy I have. I use a 15ml syringe filled with 10 ml in the morning with my coffee and like jet fuel I fly out of the house. I have also noted that I seem to heal any cuts or scrapes in two days to a week and at 62 that's fast I have not healed up so fast since I was in my teens. Watch the price it does fluctuate. Good stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: KMJ

customer_reviews.title: love it I have Energy more focused BP is down ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been taking this product for 6 weeks, love it I have Energy more focused BP is down my body feels so much better, I have scoliosis and deal with chronic pain and for some reason I'm feeling great.
customer_reviews.author: Leesa Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: She seems to like it. As long as she is happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my holistic wife. She seems to like it. As long as she is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hardegree

customer_reviews.title: GOOGLE the benefits!! GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily for ALL kinds of benefits, especially hair, skin and nails... google the benefits of this oil and add it to your daily supplements. It really works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey, CA

customer_reviews.title: Relax wrist injury.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to help me with an old fractured wrist that after carrying heavy items or to much movement, it bothers me. So I take 3 drops with a dropper under my tongue and in about 10 minutes it starts to relax my wrist. Don't use it everyday only when needed. It's great highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby skin
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. Had my sister to make me some cream for my skin due to it being so dry and mixing it with Shea butter and few other things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Hemp for the price
customer_reviews.text: Give it 5 stars based on the other reviews. Still too early to tell what it does for me.
customer_reviews.author: caribman161

customer_reviews.title: Aids in stomach ulcers.
customer_reviews.text: great to use with protein shakes. I bought the product due to having a stomach ulcer. It aids in coating the stomach to prevent from using so many medications.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love it even mix it with cream to rub on ...
customer_reviews.text: I use hemp oil on my skin, hair, etc! Love it even mix it with cream to rub on sore muscles!
customer_reviews.author: Silverfox

customer_reviews.title: Feeling healthy
customer_reviews.text: First time user of this product and love it. Consistency and look of olive oil. Taste is grassy. I use this as a supplement in my protein shakes because it is loaded with healthy Omega fats and has 0 cholesterol. After 7 days of consistent use I have noticed a great improvement in my irregularity (sorry). Feeling healthy. So many benefits when using with a healthy diet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kirklin

customer_reviews.title: This hemp oil is fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This hemp oil is fabulous. I use it in all by bath and body items for all of the nutritional values. I can honestly say I have tried to take it orally for my arthritis but couldn’t get past the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: jolene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent oil
customer_reviews.text: Oil has excellent taste and is very good on tossed salad. The health benefits, taste and price make this a excellent product. I will purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: FJMusc

customer_reviews.title: I received this product and it was past the expiration date.
customer_reviews.text: This product was out of date and smells rancid. I can't return it OR use it. I would love to delete the one star that I had to give it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Rooney

customer_reviews.title: I live in a very dry part of the country and my skin gets super dry, lotions do not always do the trick
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this on my face. I live in a very dry part of the country and my skin gets super dry, lotions do not always do the trick. I use this a couple nights a week, put a little on a cotton ball and spread it around. Just a little, it absorbs quickly. If there is excess you can wipe it off with another cotton ball. I think this is definitely helping with my acne, and it works great as a moisturizer. It definitely smells like vegetable oil, but it goes away quickly and personally I do not mind. I haven't tried using it for cooking yet but I'm sure it would be useful there too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Morgan

customer_reviews.title: YUCK!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is absolutely disgusting. There is no way I could use it by itself or in other food. Dont buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff I'll always keep this on hand our dogs Love it Great for human and animal use I'll buy again
customer_reviews.author: Don't be so nosy!

customer_reviews.title: I works great for
customer_reviews.text: This was for a friend.. I works great for her
customer_reviews.author: Carl Williams

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Topical Oil
customer_reviews.text: The best! My family uses this as a topical oil. We've seen it heal our skin on minor scrapes and as a moisturizer for our skin and hair after showering or bathing. We have ordered this product more than once and it always arrives on time and in good condition. We are very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: taste B but it actually seems to work ! so.. Aplus
customer_reviews.author: valerie hyatt

customer_reviews.title: It has Omega's which is good daily. helps eyes
customer_reviews.text: i use it daily, just as an overall health. I also let my dog have it in food.
customer_reviews.author: Bronco

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This hemp oil is has a smooth consistency in each and every bottle. The health benefits, according to everything I have read, are substantial. I use them in our daily fruit smoothies and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kay K.

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for my scalp as a oil treatment I have only used it 3 times so far. It seems to be helping
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Requilman

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Great value, seems to be a good quality oil. I will definitely order more.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Works great in a salad and helps in pain
customer_reviews.text: Works great in a salad and helps in pain....and to keep my stool moveing when takeing certain percription drugs that blacks the stool moveing. And to keep my stool soft. But I take dose X 2.....
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great! Seems like a great quality oil. Really happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: W. Greenway

customer_reviews.title: Expired on arrival
customer_reviews.text: This item was long past expiration when I received it
customer_reviews.author: alex giguere

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: very unhappy, this bottle is only about 1/2 full & the price was not as first posted in ad
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my shakes no harsh taste at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Awful!
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this after reading great reviews but I couldn't get past the taste. I added a small amount to the blender while making smoothies for my husband and I. We couldn't choke the smoothies down. The hemp oil has this musty taste and smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Snell

customer_reviews.title: Don't drink too much or you'll make loud, strange noises.
customer_reviews.text: Gives me GAS if I drink too much of it. lol. I accidentally drank wayyyyy too much one morning while half asleep after getting up. It's a good thing I'm retired. I feel better when I take this. Taste is kinda funny nutty but I just swallow it down with my morning coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Mike O.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I give this to my dog and cat. I don't care for the bitterness of the oil but am going to make salad dressing with it for myself this spring and summer.
customer_reviews.author: Country Liv

customer_reviews.title: Taste bad!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't experience any of the positive affects that were advertise . Taste bad !
customer_reviews.author: Byron Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Better packaging
customer_reviews.text: I was looking foward to this item until it arrived and the box was covered with oil due to the fact the cap broke. Cmon seriously
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is very strong and not our cup on tea! It changes the flavor of the item cooking.
customer_reviews.author: V

product_meta.title: Nutiva Organic, Cold-Pressed, Unrefined Hemp Seed Oil from non-GMO, Sustainably Farmed Canadian Hemp, 24-ounces
product_meta.description:
Nutiva Organic, Cold-Pressed, Unrefined Hemp Seed Oil from non-GMO, Sustainably Farmed Canadian Hemp contains the ideal ratio of omega 6 to omega 3 fats. Unlike other oils on the market, Nutiva Organic, Cold-Pressed, Unrefined Hemp Seed Oil is never refined, deodorized or bleached. At Nutiva, we start with organic, non-GMO, sustainably grown hemp seeds, harvested and cold pressed to naturally extract an oil rich in essential fatty acids, antioxidants and chlorophyll. The mild aroma and fresh nutty flavor make it great for enhancing your favorite recipes. It's ideal as a low-heat cooking oil, or raw as a nutritious dressing. Nutiva Organic, Cold-Pressed, Unrefined Hemp Seed Oil is a healthful addition to vegetarian, vegan, raw, whole food, paleo, ketogenic, and gluten-free diets. Nutiva was founded in 1999 with a single purpose in mind - to Revolutionize the Way the World Eats. Our role is to produce and promote organic, nutrient dense superfoods that are good for you and good for the planet. Social and environmental responsibility is a core part of Nutiva’s culture and business. From sourcing organic products, to obtaining fair trade certification, to greening our facilities and operations, to funding tree planting at schools in our local community, we are constantly seeking ways to better protect our environment and ensure a better quality of life for employees, customers, and the communities we serve.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :8.7 x 3 x 2.9 inches; 1.6 Pounds
 * Item model number :OIL301p
 * Date First Available :August 7, 2014
 * Manufacturer :AmazonUs/NUTJM
 * ASIN :B00MHTFK7K

 *

At Nutiva, we start with organic, non-GMO, sustainably grown hemp seeds, harvested and cold pressed to naturally extract an oil rich in essential fatty acids, antioxidants and chlorophyll. The mild aroma and fresh nutty flavor make it great for enhancing your favorite recipes. It's ideal as a low-heat cooking oil, or raw as a nutritious dressing. Nutiva Organic, Cold-Pressed, Unrefined Hemp Seed Oil is a healthful addition to vegetarian, vegan, raw, whole food, paleo, ketogenic, and gluten-free diets. Nutiva was founded in 1999 with a single purpose in mind - to Revolutionize the Way the World Eats. Our role is to produce and promote organic, nutrient dense superfoods that are good for you and good for the planet. Social and environmental responsibility is a core part of Nutiva’s culture and business. From sourcing organic products, to obtaining fair trade certification, to greening our facilities and operations, to funding tree planting at schools in our local community, we are constantly seeking ways to better protect our environment and ensure a better quality of life for employees, customers, and the communities we serve.
feature_bullets: NUTRIENT DENSE: Nutiva Organic, Cold-Pressed, Unrefined Hemp Seed Oil contains the ideal 3:1 ratio of Omega 3 and Omega 6 fatty acids and is rich in antioxidants and chlorophyll.

NATURALLY EXTRACTED: Nutiva’s all-natural cold press extraction process yields a pure, nutty-tasting, nutrient-rich oil that's high in fatty acids and antioxidants without the use of dangerous and harmful chemicals, hexane, or heat.

PREMIUM DIET COMPATIBILITY: Nutiva Organic, Cold-Pressed, Unrefined Hemp Seed Oil is an ideal source of EFS's (Essential Fatty Acids) and antioxidants, just right for vegetarian, vegan, raw, whole food, paleo, ketogenic, gluten-free diets.

COMMITMENT TO QUALITY: Nutiva partners with Canadian farmers to source the world’s finest organic, non-GMO, sustainably grown hemp seeds and stringently adheres to USDA certified organic and non-GMO guidelines to deliver superfood that is good for you and good for the planet.
EASY TO USE PACKAGING: Nutiva Organic, Cold-Pressed, Unrefined Hemp Seed Oil is packaged in safe, convenient, BPA-free packaging.
